content: Is there a IHE Device Registry profile? Or a generic Xxx Registry profile? I saw pages on the ihe wiki on Decease Registry and Immunization Registry, but they are empty.
My question is not about the content, but rather the interface / API.
@Todd Cooper can you answer?
This is the site that holds all of the IHE profiles using FHIR http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/Category:FHIR

@Michael van der Zel There is no IHE Device Registry profile ... that I know of at least. Can you provide a bit more information about what you are looking for (what API capabilities), and I should be able to let you know what is under development where. What kinds of devices, also. Point-of-care medical devices? Personal health devices? Implantable devices? Etc.

@Todd Cooper We are working on using a Implantable device registry, but I cannot imagine it would matter for the API what kind of device. It is about registering an implantation or explantation of a device with the goal to create reports and sometimes detailed reports when e.g. some type of device is recalled.
